attributes.action: scrap plans to replace local GP surgeries with Polyclinics.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want to keep our local GP surgeries where patients can see the same GP and not have to travel long distances.  We want to scrap plans to build Polyclinics.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
